item.title: 24 Hours Before Attack On ICE, NBC Ran A Hoax Accusing ICE Of Holding Child Hostage

item.title: The Left Accuses The Right Of Hate To Avoid Debate And Silence Opposition
item.description: Conservatives' views on marriage, transgenderism, abortion, race, and more are based on reason, science, economics, and the Bible — not hate.

item.title: Kimmel Backers Accusing FCC Of ‘Authoritarianism’ Silent On Democrats’ Threats Against Carr, Broadcasters
item.description: Private TV station owners are not obligated under federal law to publicize certain content. Democrats accused them of quid pro quo anyway.
